channel.title: TypeScript on blog.daruyanagi.jp
channel.description: Recent content in TypeScript on blog.daruyanagi.jp

item.title: WebMatrix 3 Preview：TypeScript のサポート
item.description: Hugely improved remote editing experience with great code completion and colorization for PHP, ASP.NET as well as Node.js. Support for TypeScript is now included. WebMatrix 3 Preview Release Notes 確かに、追加できるファイルの形式に TypeScript（*.ts）が追加されている

item.title: 未来の JavaScript を先取りする TypeScript
item.description: Today, we’re introducing a new programming language that solves a very specific problem – getting JavaScript development to scale. That language is TypeScript. You can learn more about the TypeScript project, download an early preview, read and discuss the language specification, explore the online playground, and peruse the source of the compiler (on the TypeScript project site on CodePlex, with git). TypeScript: JavaScript Development at Application
